column4: Hello guys, how do I share files between two Ubuntu box? I have a LAN up already
I know I could share files with a Windows box with Samba
Hey guys?
Hi Veggie
ah, I means, did samba also works between 2 linux boxes? I know I could share files between a Linux box and a Windows one using samba
OK, thanks
Another question, just to be curious, what is the numbers before every line of message showed during startup?
I know it should be some kind of timing
time in seconds from boot
is it really in seconds?
afaics yes
sometimes I get something like [33.125000]  followed by [2.175000]
your are refering to the msgs you can inspect with dmesg ?
yes, they also show up while booting without the quite option
mines are secuential and i do know for sure that they are timestamps
i compile my own kernels and there is a config option to turn them on/off
ok thanks, in fact it's booting with a LiveCD when I noticed they are not constantly increasing
however when booting from HDD it's sequential
dunno what can couse this behavior... maybe a timer related bug
ok thanks, and it's in seconds right?
afaics yes
that only restarts the *user* X session
